# 订单管理(快递.小包)

## 获取一个订单

**note**:

**url**:`/edi/web-services/getOneOrder`

**method**：`GET`

**consumes**:`["application/json"]`

**produces**:`["application/json"]`



**Request Params**：

| name     | description                 | in     | require | data type | schema |
| -------- | --------------------------- | ------ | ------- | --------- | ------ |
| appKey   | 鉴权appKey                    | header | true    | string    |        |
| appToken | 鉴权appToken                  | header | true    | string    |        |
| jobNum   | 工作号，jobNum 或 poNum，至少需要提供一个 | query  | false   | string    |        |
| poNum    | PO号，jobNum 或 poNum，至少需要提供一个 | query  | false   | string    |        |

**schema Description**



**ExpressCargoResult**

| name            | description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | type           | schema |
| --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------- | ------ |
| cargoName       | 货名                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | string         |        |
| cargoNameEn     | 英文货名                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | string         |        |
| gw              | 重量                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | number(double) |        |
| gwTtl           | 总重量                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | number(double) |        |
| height          | 高度                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | number(double) |        |
| hsCode          | 海关编码                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | string         |        |
| lbs             | 重量单位-磅                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | number(double) |        |
| length          | 长度                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | number(double) |        |
| originalCountry | 原产国                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | string         |        |
| packageType     | 包装类型： "CTNS", "BAGS", "ROLLS", "PALLETS", "BALES","BOXES", "CASES", "WOODEN CASES", "BUNDLES", "COILS","DRUMS", "SACKS", "PIECES", "PACKAGES", "SETS", "REELS", "TRAYS", "TINS", "CRATES", "UNITS", "TANKS", "PCS", "CARTONS","WOODEN CRATES", "PLYWOOD CASES", "OTHERS" | string         |        |
| pkgs            | 件数                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | integer(int32) |        |
| productUrl      | 产品链接                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | string         |        |
| quantity        | 数量                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | number(double) |        |
| remarks         | 备注                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | string         |        |
| sku             | SKU                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | string         |        |
| usdValuePerUnit | 单价                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | number(double) |        |
| vol             | 体积                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | number(double) |        |
| volTtl          | 总体积                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | number(double) |        |
| width           | 宽度                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | number(double) |        |

**OneOrderChargesResult**

| name        | description | type           | schema |
| ----------- | ----------- | -------------- | ------ |
| count       | 数量          | number(double) |        |
| currency    | 币种          | string         |        |
| item        | 费用类型        | string         |        |
| payAmount   | 实付金额        | number(double) |        |
| payCurrency | 实付币种        | string         |        |
| payExchange | 汇率          | number(double) |        |
| price       | 单价          | number(double) |        |
| total       | 金额          | number(double) |        |
| unit        | 计量单位        | string         |        |

## 获取订单费用

**note**:

**url**:`/edi/web-services/getOrderCharges`

**method**：`GET`

**consumes**:`["application/json"]`

**produces**:`["application/json"]`



**Request Params**：

| name     | description    | in     | require | data type | schema |
| -------- | -------------- | ------ | ------- | --------- | ------ |
| appKey   | 鉴权appKey       | header | true    | string    |        |
| appToken | 鉴权appToken     | header | true    | string    |        |
| jobNum   | 工作号(二选一)       | query  | false   | string    |        |
| poNum    | PO#/采购订单号(二选一) | query  | false   | string    |        |

**200Response Example**:

```json
{
    "charges": [
        {
            "amount": 0,
            "billNum": "",
            "currency": "USD",
            "dnCn": "",
            "item": "海运费",
            "mcNum": "",
            "paidAmt": 0
        }
    ],
    "code": "200",
    "description": "Job# not found!"
}
```

**200Response Params**:

| name        | description                   | type   | schema              |
| ----------- | ----------------------------- | ------ | ------------------- |
| charges     | 费用列表                          | array  | ParcelChargesResult |
| code        | 处理结果状态码，200处理成功、4开关的状态码表示处理失败 | string |                     |
| description | 处理结果消息。如失败将返回失败原因             | string |                     |



**schema Description**



**ParcelChargesResult**

| name     | description                              | type           | schema |
| -------- | ---------------------------------------- | -------------- | ------ |
| amount   | 费用金额                                     | number(double) |        |
| billNum  | 对账单号                                     | string         |        |
| currency | 费用币种                                     | string         |        |
| dnCn     | 收付方向     dn代表收款    cn代表付款（物流公司付客户，一般是退费） | string         |        |
| item     | 费用名称                                     | string         |        |
| mcNum    | 月结对账号                                    | string         |        |
| paidAmt  | 已付款核销的金额                                 | number(double) |        |

## 获取订单列表(分页)

**note**:

**url**:`/edi/web-services/getOrders`

**method**：`GET`

**consumes**:`["application/json"]`

**produces**:`["application/json"]`

## 获取出库/发货订单费用

**note**:

**url**:`/edi/web-services/getOutboundOrderCharges`

**method**：`GET`

**consumes**:`["application/json"]`

**produces**:`["application/json"]`



**Request Params**：

| name     | description    | in     | require | data type | schema |

| appToken | 鉴权appToken     | header | true    | string    |        |

| poNum    | PO#/采购订单号(二选一) | query  | false   | string    |        |

## 发送装箱数据

**note**:

**url**:`/edi/web-services/parcel/sendPackage`

**method**：`POST`

**consumes**:`["application/json"]`

**produces**:`["application/json"]`

**Request Example**：

```json
{
    "fuzzyNum": "",
    "jobNum": "",
    "parcelPackageDataList": [
        {
            "cargoName": "",
            "gw": 0,
            "gwTtl": 0,
            "height": 0,
            "length": 0,
            "packageType": "",
            "pkgs": 0,
            "sku": "",
            "vol": 0,
            "volTtl": 0,
            "width": 0
        }
    ],
    "poNum": ""
}
```

**Request Params**：

| name                 | description          | in     | require | data type            | schema               |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------ | ------- | -------------------- | -------------------- |
| appKey               | 鉴权appKey             | header | true    | string               |                      |
| appToken             | 鉴权appToken           | header | true    | string               |                      |
| parcelPackageDataReq | parcelPackageDataReq | body   | true    | ParcelPackageDataReq | ParcelPackageDataReq |

**schema Description**



**ParcelPackageDataReq**

| name                  | description                  | in   | require | data type | schema            |
| --------------------- | ---------------------------- | ---- | ------- | --------- | ----------------- |
| fuzzyNum              | 多号匹配(工作号/PO号；速度慢，可能匹配错误，慎用！) | body | false   | string    |                   |
| jobNum                | 业务单号  ***和采购订单号 二选一          | body | false   | string    |                   |
| parcelPackageDataList | 数据                           | body | false   | array     | ParcelPackageData |
| poNum                 | PO/采购订单号                     | body | false   | string    |                   |

**ParcelPackageData**

| name        | description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | in   | require | data type      | schema |
| ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---- | ------- | -------------- | ------ |
| cargoName   | 商品名称                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | body | false   | string         |        |
| gw          | 单件重量 KGS                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | body | false   | number(double) |        |
| gwTtl       | 重量合计 KGS                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | body | false   | number(double) |        |
| height      | 包装高度 CM                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | body | false   | number(double) |        |
| length      | 包装长度 CM                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | body | false   | number(double) |        |
| packageType | 包装类型： "CTNS", "BAGS", "ROLLS", "PALLETS", "BALES","BOXES", "CASES", "WOODEN CASES", "BUNDLES", "COILS","DRUMS", "SACKS", "PIECES", "PACKAGES", "SETS", "REELS", "TRAYS", "TINS", "CRATES", "UNITS", "TANKS", "PCS", "CARTONS","WOODEN CRATES", "PLYWOOD CASES", "OTHERS" | body | false   | string         |        |
| pkgs        | 件数                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | body | false   | integer(int32) |        |
| sku         | SKU                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | body | false   | string         |        |
| vol         | 单件体积 CBM                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | body | false   | number(double) |        |
| volTtl      | 体积合计 CBM                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | body | false   | number(double) |        |
| width       | 包装宽度 CM                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | body | false   | number(double) |        |

## 获取订单费用

**note**:

**Request Params**：

| name                 | description          | in     | require | data type            | schema               |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------ | ------- | -------------------- | -------------------- |
| appKey               | 鉴权appKey             | header | true    | string               |                      |
| appToken             | 鉴权appToken           | header | true    | string               |                      |
| createParcelLabelReq | createParcelLabelReq | body   | true    | CreateParcelLabelReq | CreateParcelLabelReq |

**schema Description**



**CreateParcelLabelReq**

| name                    | description                                               | in   | require | data type         | schema                           |
| ----------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | ---- | ------- | ----------------- | -------------------------------- |
| asynTask                | 异步选项 默认false； 如值为true 则先返回jobNum 再调用getParcelLabel获取label | body | false   | boolean           |                                  |
| carrier                 | 快递公司UPS FEDEX DHL DPD USPS OTHERS                         | body | false   | string            |                                  |
| channelCode             | 发件、打单账号代码                                                 | body | true    | string            |                                  |
| chargeChannelCode       | 计费渠道代码（用于订单自动计费）                                          | body | false   | string            |                                  |
| etd                     | 取件日期                                                      | body | true    | string(date-time) |                                  |
| expressCargos           | 装箱明细 List                                                 | body | true    | array             | CreateParcelLabelExpressCargoReq |
| importerTaxId           | 进口商税号                                                     | body | false   | string            |                                  |
| isResidential           | 是否住宅地址 true/false 默认false                                 | body | false   | boolean           |                                  |
| jobNum                  | 工作号。提供则更新订单 重新获取label ；不提供则新建                             | body | false   | string            |                                  |
| labelChannelCode        | 子渠道代码(非必填)                                                | body | false   | string            |                                  |
| poNum                   | 客户原单号                                                     | body | true    | string            |                                  |
| remarks                 | 备注                                                        | body | false   | string            |                                  |
| serviceDescription      | 服务类型                                                      | body | false   | string            |                                  |
| serviceType             | 服务类型代码 可通过 获取服务类型 接口获取                                    | body | true    | string            |                                  |
| shipmentType            | 业务类型： "PARCEL","EXPRESS"  对应：小包、快递 默认快递类型                 | body | true    | string            |                                  |
| shipperAddressLineOne   | 发件地址1                                                     | body | false   | string            |                                  |
| shipperAddressLineThree | 发件地址3                                                     | body | false   | string            |                                  |
| shipperAddressLineTwo   | 发件地址2                                                     | body | false   | string            |                                  |
| shipperAttentionName    | 发件人                                                       | body | false   | string            |                                  |
| shipperCity             | 发件城市                                                      | body | false   | string            |                                  |
| shipperCompanyName      | 发件人公司名。如不提供发件人地址信息则自动填充打单账号绑定地址信息                         | body | false   | string            |                                  |

| mblNum           | 主单号                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | string |                 |
| notifyBl         | 提单资料 通知人                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | string |                 |
| pkgDescription   | 提单资料 件数描述                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | string |                 |

| porId            | 收货地代码                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | string |                 |
| porName          | 收货地名称                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | string |                 |
| refNum           | EDI参考号                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | string |                 |
| releaseWay       | 放货方式：OBL        正本提单\n        TR        电放\n        SWB        Sea Way Bill                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | string |                 |
| serviceTerm      | 运输服务条款：CY-CY***海运业务DOOR-CY***海运业务CY-DOOR***海运业务CFS-CY***海运业务CY-CFS***海运业务CFS-CFS***海运业务DOOR-CFS***海运业务CFS-DOOR***海运业务CY-FO***海运业务CY-RAMP***海运业务AIRPORT-AIRPORT***空运业务DOOR-AIRPORT***空运业务AIRPORT-DOOR***空运业务FLT***散杂货船FIO***散杂货船FILO***散杂货船LIFO***散杂货船STATION-STATION***铁路运输DOOR-STATION***铁路运输STATION-DOOR***铁路运输DOOR-DOOR | string |                 |
| shipperBl        | 提单资料 发货人                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | string |                 |
| tradeTerm        | 贸易条款                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | string |                 |
| voy              | 航次                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | string |                 |
| vsl              | 船名                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | string |                 |

| sealNum     | 封条号码                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | body | false   | string         |        |
| vgm         | VGM重量 KG                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | body | false   | number(float)  |        |

## 获取入仓数据

**note**:

**url**:`/edi/web-services/getWarehousingData`

**consumes**:`["application/json"]`

**produces**:`["application/json"]`



**Request Params**：

| name     | description           | in     | require | data type | schema |
| -------- | --------------------- | ------ | ------- | --------- | ------ |
| appKey   | 鉴权appKey              | header | true    | string    |        |
| appToken | 鉴权appToken            | header | true    | string    |        |
| jobNum   | 可以是：工作号、主单号/快递跟踪号，SO号 | query  | true    | string    |        |

**200Response Example**:

```json
{
    "customRequired": true,
    "dataList": [
        {
            "barcode": "264554545",
            "batchNumber": "234234234",
            "cargoName": "手机",
            "fbaCtnNo": "FBA2342342340001",
            "files": [],
            "gw": 10,
            "height": 10,
            "length": 10,
            "pkgNum": 1,
            "pkgType": "CTNS",
            "registrationTime": "2024-04-01T10:10:10Z",
            "remarks": "备注",
            "tracking": "1Z2342234234234",
            "vol": 1,
            "width": 10
        }
    ],
    "deliveryPlace": "ONT8",
    "destCountryCode": "US",
    "jobNum": "JOB2302234234",
    "packages": "20",
    "poNum": "PO234234234",
    "productName": "美东快线",
    "shiptoPostcode": "92551"
}
```

**200Response Params**:

| name            | description | type    | schema          |
| --------------- | ----------- | ------- | --------------- |
| customRequired  | 是否需要报关      | boolean |                 |
| dataList        | 订单列表        | array   | WarehousingData |
| deliveryPlace   | 送货地         | string  |                 |
| destCountryCode | 目的国代码       | string  |                 |
| jobNum          | 工作号         | string  |                 |
| packages        | 入仓件数        | string  |                 |
| poNum           | PO原单号       | string  |                 |
| productName     | 产品名称        | string  |                 |
| shiptoPostcode  | 邮编          | string  |                 |



**schema Description**



**WarehousingData**

| name             | description                   | type              | schema |
| ---------------- | ----------------------------- | ----------------- | ------ |
| barcode          | 条码                            | string            |        |
| batchNumber      | 批次号                           | string            |        |
| cargoName        | 货物名称                          | string            |        |
| fbaCtnNo         | FBA箱号                         | string            |        |
| files            | 云文件                           | array             |        |
| gw               | 单件重量（KG）                      | number(float)     |        |
| height           | 包装高度（CM）                      | number(float)     |        |
| length           | 包装长度（CM）                      | number(float)     |        |
| pkgNum           | 件数                            | integer(int32)    |        |
| pkgType          | 包装类型                          | string            |        |
| registrationTime | 入仓时间 yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' | string(date-time) |        |

**schema Description**



**UpdateFmsOrderReq**

| name                 | description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | in   | require | data type           | schema              |
| -------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---- | ------- | ------------------- | ------------------- |
| bizType              | 业务类型                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | body | false   | string              |                     |
| booking              | 订舱信息                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | body | false   | BookingReportDTOReq | BookingReportDTOReq |
| bookingAgentCode     | 订舱代理代码                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | body | false   | string              |                     |
| cargoName            | 货物名称                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | body | false   | string              |                     |
| cargoReadyDate       | 货物备好日期                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | body | false   | string(date-time)   |                     |
| cargoType            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | body | false   | string              |                     |
| cargoValue           | 货值 如200usd RMB1000                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | body | false   | string              |                     |
| carrier              | 承运人                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | body | false   | string              |                     |
| chargeByCbm          | 计费 方式 true：按体积计费false: 按公斤计费（默认）                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | body | false   | boolean             |                     |
| chargeWeight         | 计费重(CW)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | body | false   | number(double)      |                     |
| clientAttn           | 客户联系人姓名（需要和资料库姓名一致）                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | body | false   | string              |                     |
| clientCode           | 客户代码                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | body | false   | string              |                     |
| cls                  | 截关日期                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | body | false   | string(date-time)   |                     |
| contractNum          | 合约号                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | body | false   | string              |                     |
| customFields         | 自定义字段                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | body | false   | array               | CustomFieldReq      |
| customRequired       | 是否需要安排出口清关                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | body | false   | boolean             |                     |
| deliveryAgentCode    | 提货代理代码                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | body | false   | string              |                     |
| deliveryBl           | 送货地址(FBA业务) 或 提单收货人(传统业务)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | body | false   | string              |                     |
| deliveryWay          | 派送方式。"ftl": "整车派送",         "ltl": "拼车派送",          "pickup": "客户自提",          "fcl": "整柜派送",          "truck": "卡车派送",          "express": "快递派送"                                                                                                                                                                         | body | true    | string              |                     |
| destCountryCode      | 目的国二字代码                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | body | false   | string              |                     |
| etd                  | 预计离港日期                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | body | false   | string(date-time)   |                     |
| fbaWhCode            | 送货地 FBA仓库代码***FBA电商业务有效                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | body | false   | string              |                     |
| flight               | 航班 空运                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | body | false   | string              |                     |
| freightTerm          | 运费条款 PPD 运费预付 CCT 运费到付                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | body | true    | string              |                     |
| gw                   | 总毛重(KG)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | body | false   | number(double)      |                     |

## 更新入仓数据(V2)

**note**:

**url**:`/edi/web-services/v2/sendWarehousingData`

**method**：`POST`

**consumes**:`["application/json"]`

**produces**:`["application/json"]`

**Request Example**：

```json
{
    "clientSoNum": "",
    "fuzzyNum": "",
    "jobNum": "",
    "poNum": "",
    "porPlace": "",
    "refNum": "",
    "shipmentId": "",
    "soNum": "",
    "warehousingDatas": [
        {
            "barcode": "",
            "batchNumber": "",
            "cargoName": "",
            "files": [
                {
                    "base64": "e2e92bfed062afa3a***********",
                    "fileName": "subSysGuide.jpg",
                    "fileUrl": "https://hforwarder.oss-cn-shenzhen.aliyuncs.com/auStudio/subSysGuide.jpg"
                }
            ],
            "gw": 0,
            "gwTtl": 0,
            "height": 0,
            "length": 0,
            "location": "",
            "pallets": 0,
            "pkgNum": 0,
            "pkgType": "",
            "registrationTime": "",
            "remarks": "",
            "vol": 0,
            "volTtl": 0,
            "width": 0
        }
    ]
}
```

**Request Params**：

| name                   | description                                                                                          | in     | require | data type              | schema                 |
| ---------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------ | ------- | ---------------------- | ---------------------- |
| appKey                 | 鉴权appKey                                                                                             | header | true    | string                 |                        |
| appToken               | 鉴权appToken                                                                                           | header | true    | string                 |                        |
| addNew                 | 是否新增。true 新增数据；false 覆盖数据（全量）                                                                        | query  | false   | boolean                |                        |
| overwriteByBarcode     | 是否根据条码覆盖/更新已有数据。true 覆盖；false 不覆盖                                                                    | query  | false   | boolean                |                        |
| isBoxNoId              | 是否箱号作为业务单识别号？ true 工作号/PO号等识别号，自动去掉后面4位数字，Shipment ID去掉7位（箱号）；false 不自动截取，全字符串匹配（条码不包含箱号，或发送前已去掉箱号）。 | query  | false   | boolean                |                        |
| sendWarehousingDataReq | sendWarehousingDataReq                                                                               | body   | true    | SendWarehousingDataReq | SendWarehousingDataReq |

**schema Description**



**SendWarehousingDataReq**

| name             | description                                           | in   | require | data type | schema                       |
| ---------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | ---- | ------- | --------- | ---------------------------- |
| clientSoNum      | 客户入仓号                                                 | body | false   | string    |                              |
| fuzzyNum         | 多号匹配(工作号/PO号/EDI参考号/Shipment ID/SO入仓号；速度慢，可能匹配错误，慎用！) | body | false   | string    |                              |
| jobNum           | 业务单号  ***和采购订单号 二选一                                   | body | false   | string    |                              |
| poNum            | 采购订单号                                                 | body | false   | string    |                              |
| porPlace         | 收货地(仓)。非必传，传值将覆盖业务单已有收货地                              | body | false   | string    |                              |
| refNum           | 参考号(EDI)                                              | body | false   | string    |                              |
| shipmentId       | Shipment ID                                           | body | false   | string    |                              |
| soNum            | SO/入仓号                                                | body | false   | string    |                              |
| warehousingDatas | 入库数据                                                  | body | false   | array     | SendWarehousingDataReqWhData |

**SendWarehousingDataReqWhData**

| name             | description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | in   | require | data type         | schema     |
| ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---- | ------- | ----------------- | ---------- |
| barcode          | Barcode                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | body | false   | string            |            |
| batchNumber      | 入仓批次号                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | body | false   | string            |            |
| cargoName        | 产品名称                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | body | false   | string            |            |
| files            | 附件                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | body | false   | array             | FileDTOReq |
| gw               | 单件重量 KGS                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | body | false   | number(float)     |            |
| gwTtl            | 重量合计 KGS                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | body | false   | number(float)     |            |
| height           | 包装高度 CM                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | body | false   | number(float)     |            |
| length           | 包装长度 CM                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | body | false   | number(float)     |            |
| location         | 库位                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | body | false   | string            |            |
| pallets          | 托盘数 ***有托盘数量时，以下数据均为托盘数据                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | body | false   | integer(int32)    |            |
| pkgNum           | 件数                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | body | false   | integer(int32)    |            |
| pkgType          | 包装类型： "CTNS", "BAGS", "ROLLS", "PALLETS", "BALES","BOXES", "CASES", "WOODEN CASES", "BUNDLES", "COILS","DRUMS", "SACKS", "PIECES", "PACKAGES", "SETS", "REELS", "TRAYS", "TINS", "CRATES", "UNITS", "TANKS", "PCS", "CARTONS","WOODEN CRATES", "PLYWOOD CASES", "OTHERS" | body | false   | string            |            |
| registrationTime | 登记时间。UTC格式: 2019-12-28T08:31:57.097Z                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | body | false   | string(date-time) |            |
| remarks          | 备注                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | body | false   | string            |            |
| vol              | 单件体积 CBM                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | body | false   | number(float)     |            |
| volTtl           | 体积合计 CBM                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | body | false   | number(float)     |            |
| width            | 包装宽度 CM                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | body | false   | number(float)     |            |

**FileDTOReq**

| name     | description                | in   | require | data type | schema |
| -------- | -------------------------- | ---- | ------- | --------- | ------ |
| base64   | 文件Base64，与fileUrl 二者至少提供一个 | body | false   | string    |        |
| fileName | 文件名                        | body | true    | string    |        |
| fileUrl  | 文件URL，与base64 二者至少提供一个     | body | false   | string    |        |

## 更新订单状态(V2)

**note**:请求时，自定义节点放body，其它节点放query

**url**:`/edi/web-services/v2/updateShipmentStatus`

**method**：`POST`

**consumes**:`["application/json"]`

**produces**:`["application/json"]`

**Request Example**：

```json
{
    "orderNods": [
        {
            "nodeName": "",
            "nodeTime": ""
        }
    ]
}
```

**Request Params**：

| name                       | description                                                                            | in     | require | data type               | schema                  |
| -------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------ | ------- | ----------------------- | ----------------------- |
| appKey                     | 鉴权appKey                                                                               | header | true    | string                  |                         |
| appToken                   | 鉴权appToken                                                                             | header | true    | string                  |                         |
| jobNum                     | OPS工作号。jobNum和refNum选填一个                                                               | query  | false   | string                  |                         |
| refNum                     | EDI参考号。jobNum和refNum选填一个                                                               | query  | false   | string                  |                         |
| fullNodeUpdate             | 是否更新全部节点（不传值默认值：true）。true： 更新全部节点（不传值可清除节点，适合内部调用）; false: 更新部分节点（不传值不更新节点，适合供应商标记节点） | query  | false   | boolean                 |                         |
| pickUpTime                 | 头程提货时间（UTC格式 yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'）                                                 | query  | false   | string                  |                         |
| wmsInTime                  | 头程入仓时间（UTC格式 yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'）                                                 | query  | false   | string                  |                         |
| wmsOutTime                 | 头程出仓时间（UTC格式 yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'）                                                 | query  | false   | string                  |                         |

| ataTime                    | 目的港到港时间（UTC格式 yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'）                                                | query  | false   | string                  |                         |
| ctnsAvailableTime          | 重柜可提取时间（UTC格式 yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'）                                                | query  | false   | string                  |                         |
| onCarriageTime             | 进口提柜/转运入仓时间（UTC格式 yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'）                                            | query  | false   | string                  |                         |
| deliveryAppointmentTime    | 预约派送时间（UTC格式 yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'）                                                 | query  | false   | string                  |                         |

| hblRlsTime                 | 分单放行时间（UTC格式 yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'）。                                                | query  | false   | string                  |                         |

**schema Description**



**CreateTmsOrderReq**

| name                   | description                                               | in   | require | data type         | schema                        |
| ---------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | ---- | ------- | ----------------- | ----------------------------- |

| etd                    | 取件日期                                                      | body | true    | string(date-time) |                               |
| expressCargos          | 装箱明细 List                                                 | body | false   | array             | CreateTmsOrderExpressCargoReq |
| isResidential          | 是否住宅地址 true/false 默认false                                 | body | false   | boolean           |                               |
| labelUrl               | 已打印面单的情况下，面单的url地址                                        | body | false   | string            |                               |
| poNum                  | 采购订单号                                                     | body | true    | string            |                               |
| remarks                | 备注                                                        | body | false   | string            |                               |
| serviceDescription     | 快递服务描述 如：GROUND                                           | body | false   | string            |                               |
| serviceType            | 服务类型代码 可通过 获取服务类型 接口获取                                    | body | false   | string            |                               |
| shipfromCode           | 发件人代码 默认主系统设置                                             | body | false   | string            |                               |
| shipmentType           | 有效值：LTL（拼车） FTL(整车) EXD(快递)  CPU(自提) WMS(仓储服务)  TMS(运输业务) | body | true    | string            |                               |
| shiptoAddressLineOne   | 收件地址1                                                     | body | true    | string            |                               |
| shiptoAddressLineThree | 收件地址3                                                     | body | false   | string            |                               |
| shiptoAddressLineTwo   | 收件地址2                                                     | body | false   | string            |                               |
| shiptoAttentionName    | 收件经手人                                                     | body | true    | string            |                               |
| shiptoCity             | 收件城市                                                      | body | true    | string            |                               |
| shiptoCompanyName      | 收件公司名                                                     | body | true    | string            |                               |
| shiptoCountryCode      | 收件国家编码                                                    | body | true    | string            |                               |
| shiptoEmailAddress     | 收件人邮箱                                                     | body | false   | string            |                               |
| shiptoPhoneNumber      | 收件人手机                                                     | body | true    | string            |                               |
| shiptoPostalCode       | 收件地邮编                                                     | body | true    | string            |                               |
| shiptoProvinceCode     | 收件省编码                                                     | body | true    | string            |                               |
| soNum                  | 入仓单号                                                      | body | false   | string            |                               |
| trackingNum            | 快递跟踪号                                                     | body | false   | string            |                               |
| whCode                 | 发货仓库代码                                                    | body | true    | string            |                               |

| pallets     | 托盘数                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | body | false   | number(float)  |        |
| pkgs        | 件数                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | body | true    | integer(int32) |        |
| shipmentId  | Shipment Id                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | body | false   | string         |        |

## 获取TMS订单列表(TK)

**note**:

**url**:`/edi/web-services/wms/getTmsOrders`

**method**：`GET`

**consumes**:`["application/json"]`

**produces**:`["application/json"]`



**Request Params**：

| name             | description                                               | in     | require | data type | schema |
| ---------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | ------ | ------- | --------- | ------ |
| appKey           | 鉴权appKey                                                  | header | true    | string    |        |
| appToken         | 鉴权appToken                                                | header | true    | string    |        |
| companyId        | 公司ID                                                      | query  | false   | integer   |        |
| createdStartTime | 创建时间开始时间，UTC时间                                            | query  | true    | string    |        |

## 创建产品/SKU(产品库)

**note**:

**url**:`/edi/web-services/v2/createSku`

**method**：`POST`

**consumes**:`["application/json"]`

**produces**:`["application/json"]`

**Request Example**：

```json
{
    "capacity": 0,
    "capacityUnit": "",
    "code": "",
    "gMax": 0,
    "gMin": 0,
    "goodsValue": 0,
    "gw": 0,
    "height": 0,
    "length": 0,
    "name": "",
    "packageType": "",
    "sku": "",
    "vol": 0,
    "width": 0
}
```

**Request Params**：

| name         | description  | in     | require | data type    | schema       |
| ------------ | ------------ | ------ | ------- | ------------ | ------------ |
| appKey       | 鉴权appKey     | header | true    | string       |              |
| appToken     | 鉴权appToken   | header | true    | string       |              |
| createSkuReq | createSkuReq | body   | true    | CreateSkuReq | CreateSkuReq |

**schema Description**



**CreateSkuReq**

| name         | description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | in   | require | data type      | schema |
| ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---- | ------- | -------------- | ------ |
| capacity     | 容量（适用于液体产品）                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | body | false   | number(float)  |        |
| capacityUnit | 容量单位 （如ml 毫升）                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | body | false   | string         |        |
| code         | 产品代码                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | body | false   | string         |        |
| gMax         | 库存上限                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | body | false   | integer(int32) |        |
| gMin         | 库存下限                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | body | false   | integer(int32) |        |
| goodsValue   | 产品采购成本                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | body | false   | number(double) |        |
| gw           | 单件毛重(KG)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | body | false   | number(float)  |        |
| height       | 包装高(CM)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | body | false   | number(float)  |        |
| length       | 包装长(CM)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | body | false   | number(float)  |        |
| name         | 产品名称                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | body | true    | string         |        |
| packageType  | 包装类型： "CTNS", "BAGS", "ROLLS", "PALLETS", "BALES","BOXES", "CASES", "WOODEN CASES", "BUNDLES", "COILS","DRUMS", "SACKS", "PIECES", "PACKAGES", "SETS", "REELS", "TRAYS", "TINS", "CRATES", "UNITS", "TANKS", "PCS", "CARTONS","WOODEN CRATES", "PLYWOOD CASES", "OTHERS" | body | true    | string         |        |
| sku          | SKU                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | body | true    | string         |        |
| vol          | 单件体积(CBM 立方米)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | body | false   | number(float)  |        |
| width        | 包装宽(CM)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | body | false   | number(float)  |        |

```json
{
    "code": "200",

}
```

## 按批次获取详细库存列表

**note**:

**url**:`/edi/web-services/v2/getDetailedInventory`

**method**：`GET`

**consumes**:`["application/json"]`

**produces**:`["application/json"]`



**Request Params**：

| name              | description           | in     | require | data type | schema |
| ----------------- | --------------------- | ------ | ------- | --------- | ------ |
| appKey            | 鉴权appKey              | header | true    | string    |        |
| appToken          | 鉴权appToken            | header | true    | string    |        |
| sku               | SKU                   | query  | false   | string    |        |
| page              | 页码(最小值0,代表第一页)        | query  | false   | integer   |        |
| pageSize          | 每页记录数（最大值100）         | query  | false   | integer   |        |
| warehouseCode     | 仓库代码                  | query  | false   | string    |        |
| showZeroInventory | 显示0库存记录，不传默认为false不显示 | query  | false   | boolean   |        |

**200Response Example**:

```json
{
    "currentPage": 0,
    "data": [
        {
            "ctnNo": "",
            "daysInStock": 0,
            "deliveryWaiting": 0,
            "gateInDate": "",
            "gateInRegistrationTime": "",
            "inTransitInventory": 0,
            "inventoryOnHand": 0,
            "physicalInventory": 0,
            "poNum": "",
            "sku": "",
            "status": "",
            "warehouse": "",
            "warehousingNumber": ""
        }
    ],
    "pageSize": 0,
    "recordsNum": 0,
    "totalPages": 0
}
```

**200Response Params**:

| name        | description | type           | schema         |
| ----------- | ----------- | -------------- | -------------- |
| currentPage | 当前页         | integer(int32) | integer(int32) |
| data        | 数据          | array          | DataResult     |
| pageSize    | 页记录数        | integer(int32) | integer(int32) |
| recordsNum  | 总记录数        | integer(int32) | integer(int32) |
| totalPages  | 总页数         | integer(int32) | integer(int32) |



**schema Description**



**DataResult**

| name                   | description          | type           | schema |
| ---------------------- | -------------------- | -------------- | ------ |
| ctnNo                  | 箱号                   | string         |        |
| daysInStock            | 库存天数                 | integer(int32) |        |
| deliveryWaiting        | 等待出库                 | integer(int32) |        |
| gateInDate             | 入仓日期                 | string         |        |
| gateInRegistrationTime | 入仓作业完成时间             | string         |        |
| inTransitInventory     | 在途库存                 | integer(int32) |        |

| poNum                  | po号                  | string         |        |
| sku                    | SKU                  | string         |        |
| status                 | 库存状态 OK可用 NO不可用 HD扣货 | string         |        |
| warehouse              | 仓库代码                 | string         |        |
| warehousingNumber      | 入仓号                  | string         |        |

## 创建出库/发货订单（多个）

**note**:

**url**:`/edi/web-services/v2/orderOutbound`

**method**：`POST`

**consumes**:`["application/json"]`

**produces**:`["application/json"]`

**Request Example**：

```json
[
    {
        "bizType": "",
        "cargoType": "",
        "cargoValueUsd": "",
        "carrier": "",
        "channel": "",
        "dcType": "",
        "etd": "",
        "expressCargos": [
            {
                "pkgs": 0,
                "sku": ""
            }
        ],
        "insuranceRequired": false,
        "irregularPacking": false,
        "isRemote": false,
        "isResidential": false,
        "labelChannelCode": "",
        "labelUrl": "",
        "noStockNoOrder": false,
        "platform": "",
        "platformFee": 0,
        "poNum": "",
        "refNum": "",
        "remarks": "",
        "saleFreight": 0,
        "sellAmt": 0,
        "sellCur": "",
        "serviceDescription": "",
        "serviceType": "",
        "shipfromCode": "",
        "shipmentType": "",
        "shiptoAddressLineOne": "",
        "shiptoAddressLineThree": "",
        "shiptoAddressLineTwo": "",
        "shiptoAttentionName": "",
        "shiptoCity": "",
        "shiptoCompanyName": "",
        "shiptoCountryCode": "",
        "shiptoDoorplate": "",
        "shiptoEmailAddress": "",
        "shiptoExt": "",
        "shiptoPhoneNumber": "",
        "shiptoPostalCode": "",
        "shiptoProvinceCode": "",
        "soNum": "",
        "subTrackings": [],
        "submited": false,
        "thirdPartyCode": "",
        "thirdPartyPay": false,
        "trackingNum": "",
        "whCode": ""
    }
]
```

**Request Params**：

| name                 | description          | in     | require | data type | schema           |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------ | ------- | --------- | ---------------- |
| appKey               | 鉴权appKey             | header | true    | string    |                  |
| appToken             | 鉴权appToken           | header | true    | string    |                  |
| orderOutboundReqList | orderOutboundReqList | body   | true    | array     | OrderOutboundReq |

**schema Description**



**OrderOutboundReq**

| name                   | description                                                           | in   | require | data type         | schema          |
| ---------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---- | ------- | ----------------- | --------------- |
| bizType                | 业务类型(在系统基础配置中维护,传代码)                                                  | body | false   | string            |                 |
| cargoType              | 货物类型                                                                  | body | false   | string            |                 |
| cargoValueUsd          | 保险货值 单位USD                                                            | body | false   | string            |                 |
| carrier                | 快递公司 如：UPS USPS                                                       | body | false   | string            |                 |
| channel                | 发货/计费渠道                                                               | body | false   | string            |                 |
| dcType                 | 快递签收方式 有效值： “1” (Signature)、 ”2” (Adult Signature)                    | body | false   | string            |                 |
| etd                    | 取件日期                                                                  | body | true    | string(date-time) |                 |
| expressCargos          | 装箱明细 List                                                             | body | true    | array             | ExpressCargoReq |
| insuranceRequired      | 需要买保险                                                                 | body | false   | boolean           |                 |
| irregularPacking       | 是否不规则包装 true/false 默认false                                            | body | false   | boolean           |                 |
| isRemote               | 是否偏远true/false 默认false                                                | body | false   | boolean           |                 |
| isResidential          | 是否住宅地址 true/false 默认false                                             | body | false   | boolean           |                 |
| labelChannelCode       | 打单账号（和发件人/shipfromCode不同时提供，须预先在系统维护/或者有服务商提供）                        | body | false   | string            |                 |
| labelUrl               | 已打印面单的情况下，面单的url地址, PDF文件格式                                           | body | false   | string            |                 |
| noStockNoOrder         | 缺货时 不创建订单 默认true                                                      | body | false   | boolean           |                 |
| platform               | 平台                                                                    | body | false   | string            |                 |
| platformFee            | 平台手续费                                                                 | body | false   | number(double)    |                 |
| poNum                  | 采购订单号(PO#)                                                            | body | true    | string            |                 |
| refNum                 | EDI参考号                                                                | body | false   | string            |                 |
| remarks                | 备注                                                                    | body | false   | string            |                 |
| saleFreight            | 运费                                                                    | body | false   | number(double)    |                 |
| sellAmt                | 销售金额                                                                  | body | false   | number(double)    |                 |
| sellCur                | 销售币种                                                                  | body | false   | string            |                 |
| serviceDescription     | 快递服务描述 如：GROUND                                                       | body | false   | string            |                 |
| serviceType            | 服务类型代码 可通过 获取服务类型 接口获取                                                | body | false   | string            |                 |

## 创建出库/发货订单（单个）

**note**:如调用接口过快可能会导致订单创建失败/拣货失败，可在调用接口时限流，每个客户限制调用此接口调用频率在2次/s内。同时可以加上重试功能，遇到拣货失败时（提示中包含字眼ObjectOptimisticLockingFailureException 或 Picking conflict），系统自动等待几秒后重试，可解决大部分限流导致的报错

**url**:`/edi/web-services/v2/orderOutboundOne`

**consumes**:`["application/json"]`

```json
    "isResidential": false,
    "labelChannelCode": "",
    "labelUrl": "",
    "noStockNoOrder": false,
    "platform": "",
    "platformFee": 0,
    "poNum": "",
    "refNum": "",
    "remarks": "",
    "saleFreight": 0,
    "sellAmt": 0,
    "sellCur": "",

    "serviceType": "",
    "shipfromCode": "",
    "shipmentType": "",

    "whCode": ""
}
```
