## 更新产品库SKU

**note**:

**url**:`/edi/web-services/v2/updateSku`

**method**：`POST`

**consumes**:`["application/json"]`

**produces**:`["application/json"]`

**Request Example**：

```json
{
    "capacity": 0,
    "capacityUnit": "",
    "code": "",
    "gMax": 0,
    "gMin": 0,
    "goodsValue": 0,
    "gw": 0,
    "height": 0,
    "length": 0,
    "name": "",
    "packageType": "",
    "sku": "",
    "vol": 0,
    "width": 0
}
```

**Request Params**：

| name           | description                                       | in     | require | data type    | schema       |
| -------------- | ------------------------------------------------- | ------ | ------- | ------------ | ------------ |
| appKey         | 鉴权appKey                                          | header | true    | string       |              |
| appToken       | 鉴权appToken                                        | header | true    | string       |              |
| updateSkuReq   | updateSkuReq                                      | body   | true    | UpdateSkuReq | UpdateSkuReq |
| overwriteBySku | 是否根据SKU覆盖已有数据。true:覆盖(默认)、false:不覆盖，只更新有传参且不为空的字段 | query  | false   | boolean      |              |

**schema Description**



**UpdateSkuReq**

| name         | description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | in   | require | data type      | schema |
| ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---- | ------- | -------------- | ------ |
| capacity     | 容量（适用于液体产品）                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | body | false   | number(float)  |        |
| capacityUnit | 容量单位 （如ml 毫升）                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | body | false   | string         |        |
| code         | 产品代码                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | body | false   | string         |        |
| gMax         | 库存上限                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | body | false   | integer(int32) |        |
| gMin         | 库存下限                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | body | false   | integer(int32) |        |
| goodsValue   | 产品采购成本                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | body | false   | number(double) |        |
| gw           | 单件毛重(KG)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | body | false   | number(float)  |        |
| height       | 包装高(CM)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | body | false   | number(float)  |        |
| length       | 包装长(CM)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | body | false   | number(float)  |        |
| name         | 产品名称                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | body | false   | string         |        |

## 创建入库预报/申请

**note**:

**url**:`/edi/web-services/v2/wmsInbound`

**method**：`POST`

**consumes**:`["application/json"]`

**produces**:`["application/json"]`

**Request Example**：

```json
{
    "cargoDescription": "",
    "cargoList": [
        {

            "expressNo": "",
            "fnSku": "",

            "length": 0,
            "pkgs": 0,

            "width": 0

    "ctnType": "",

    "refNum": "",
    "remarks": "",
    "rmaOrder": false,
    "truckNum": "",
    "warehouseCode": ""
}
```

**Request Params**：

| name          | description   | in     | require | data type     | schema        |
| ------------- | ------------- | ------ | ------- | ------------- | ------------- |

| appToken      | 鉴权appToken    | header | true    | string        |               |

**schema Description**



**WmsInboundReq**

| name                    | description                                           | in   | require | data type         | schema                |
| ----------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | ---- | ------- | ----------------- | --------------------- |
| cargoDescription        | 货物描述                                                  | body | false   | string            |                       |

| ctnNum                  | 集装箱柜号                                                 | body | false   | string            |                       |
| ctnType                 | 柜型                                                    | body | false   | string            |                       |
| expectedWarehousingTime | 预计入仓时间，UTC时间                                          | body | false   | string(date-time) |                       |
| handleType              | 操作模式( 1.transportService: 仓储/转运模式  2.wmsService 进销存模式 | body | false   | string            |                       |

| refNum                  | EDI参考号                                                | body | false   | string            |                       |
| remarks                 | 备注                                                    | body | false   | string            |                       |
| rmaOrder                | 退货订单标识                                                | body | false   | boolean           |                       |
| truckNum                | 送货车牌                                                  | body | false   | string            |                       |
| warehouseCode           | 仓库代码                                                  | body | true    | string            |                       |

**WmsInboundWmsCargoReq**

| name      | description | in   | require | data type      | schema |
| --------- | ----------- | ---- | ------- | -------------- | ------ |
| ctnNo     | 箱号          | body | false   | string         |        |
| expressNo | 快递单号        | body | false   | string         |        |
| fnSku     | fnSku       | body | false   | string         |        |
| height    | 高度          | body | false   | number(float)  |        |
| length    | 长度          | body | false   | number(float)  |        |
| pkgs      | 入仓数量        | body | true    | integer(int32) |        |
| sku       | SKU 需先创建SKU | body | true    | string         |        |
| width     | 宽度          | body | false   | number(float)  |        |

**ExpressLabelV3Req**

| name                   | description                                                           | in   | require | data type         | schema          |

| carrier                | 快递公司 如：UPS USPS                                                       | body | false   | string            |                 |

## 获取出库申请列表(OT)

**note**:

**url**:`/edi/web-services/wms/getOutboundOrders`

**method**：`GET`

**consumes**:`["application/json"]`

**produces**:`["application/json"]`



**Request Params**：

| name             | description                                                                                                                                           | in     | require | data type | schema |
| ---------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------ | ------- | --------- | ------ |
| appKey           | 鉴权appKey                                                                                                                                              | header | true    | string    |        |
| appToken         | 鉴权appToken                                                                                                                                            | header | true    | string    |        |
| createdStartTime | 创建时间开始时间，UTC时间(2023-08-16T10:30:15Z)                                                                                                                  | query  | true    | string    |        |
| createdEndTime   | 创建时间结束时间，UTC时间(2023-08-16T10:30:15Z)                                                                                                                  | query  | false   | string    |        |
| shipmentId       | 出库单号                                                                                                                                                  | query  | false   | string    |        |
| status           | 状态，"new": "新出仓", "Requested": "等待确认", "Amended": "已修改", "Cancelled": "已取消", "Confirmed": "等待出仓", "Declined": "已拒绝", "allOut": "已出仓","partOut": "部分出仓" | query  | false   | string    |        |
| pageNum          | 页码，每次请求最多返回100条记录，页码不提供，默认返回第一页（0为第一页，1为第二页）                                                                                                          | query  | false   | integer   |        |

## 上传文件

**note**:

**url**:`/edi/web-services/fileUpload`

**method**：`POST`

**consumes**:`["application/json"]`

**produces**:`["application/json"]`

**Request Example**：

```json
{
    "base64": "",
    "clientSoNum": "SO23423423",
    "fileName": "fmsOrdersImport.xlsx",
    "fileType": "DCD",
    "fileUrl": "https://hforwarder.oss-cn-shenzhen.aliyuncs.com/auStudio/subSysGuide.jpg",
    "poNum": "PO23423423",
    "refNum": "SZEXP1912205",
    "refNum2": "SZEXP1912205",
    "soNum": "SO23423423",
    "systemModule": "FMS",
    "trackingNum": "1Z2342323423423"
}
```

**Request Params**：

| name     | description | in     | require | data type | schema  |
| -------- | ----------- | ------ | ------- | --------- | ------- |
| appKey   | 鉴权appKey    | header | true    | string    |         |
| appToken | 鉴权appToken  | header | true    | string    |         |
| fileDTO  | fileDTO     | body   | true    | FileDTO   | FileDTO |

**schema Description**



**FileDTO**

| name         | description                                                                                                                     | in   | require | data type | schema |
| ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---- | ------- | --------- | ------ |
| base64       | 文件Base64，与fileUrl 二者至少提供一个                                                                                                      | body | false   | string    |        |
| clientSoNum  | 客户入仓号（限：FBA/FMS订单有效）                                                                                                            | body | false   | string    |        |
| fileName     | 文件名                                                                                                                             | body | true    | string    |        |
| fileType     | 文件类型，有效值""：不分类、"BK"：托运委托、"SO"：SO入仓纸、"WH"：入仓图片、"SI"补料文件、"POD"签收单证、"TK"卡车单证、"DCD"报关文件、"CRN"放行通知书、"CDS"关税单、"RBS"收款水单、"PBS"付款水单     | body | true    | string    |        |
| fileUrl      | 文件URL，与base64 二者至少提供一个                                                                                                          | body | false   | string    |        |
| poNum        | PO#/ 采购订单号                                                                                                                      | body | false   | string    |        |
| refNum       | 工作号（推荐）                                                                                                                         | body | false   | string    |        |
| refNum2      | 参考号                                                                                                                             | body | false   | string    |        |
| soNum        | SO/入仓号（限：FBA/FMS订单有效）                                                                                                           | body | false   | string    |        |
| systemModule | 系统功能模块 有效值："FMS"：对应传统海运、空运、铁路、内贸、散杂货船、仓储、运输业务；"FBA"：对应FBA海运 空运 专线业务；"PARCEL"：快递小包业务；"TMS"：目的港拼车配送（FBA）业务；"WMS"：WMS业务，包含进出仓单 退货单 | body | true    | string    |        |
| trackingNum  | 主单/ 跟踪号（WMS订单无效）                                                                                                                | body | false   | string    |        |

## 获取费用列表

**note**:

**url**:`/edi/web-services/getChargesList`

**method**：`GET`

**consumes**:`["application/json"]`

**produces**:`["application/json"]`



**Request Params**：

| name            | description                                 | in     | require | data type | schema |
| --------------- | ------------------------------------------- | ------ | ------- | --------- | ------ |
| appKey          | 鉴权appKey                                    | header | true    | string    |        |
| appToken        | 鉴权appToken                                  | header | true    | string    |        |
| createStartTime | 结束时间（按创建时间）。格式2013-08-16T10:30:15Z          | query  | true    | string    |        |
| createEndTime   | 结束时间（按创建时间）。格式2013-08-16T10:30:15Z          | query  | false   | string    |        |
| pageNum         | 页码。每次请求最多返回50条记录，页码不提供，默认返回第一页（0为第一页，1为第二页） | query  | false   | integer   |        |

**200Response Example**:

```json
{
    "charges": [
        {
            "chargeWeight": 0,
            "count": 0,
            "createTime": "2017-03-15T14:27:59Z",
            "currency": "RMB",
            "etd": "",
            "id": 0,
            "item": "文件费",
            "jobNum": "H-SZEXP170300001",
            "mblNum": "",
            "payAmount": 0,
            "payCurrency": "RMB",
            "payExchange": 0,
            "poNum": "",
            "price": 0,
            "remarks": "",
            "sku": "",
            "total": 0,
            "unit": "BL",
            "whCode": ""
        }
    ],
    "pageNum": "0",
    "pageSize": "50",
    "totalCount": "7413",
    "totalPages": "149"
}
```

**200Response Params**:

| name       | description | type   | schema                      |
| ---------- | ----------- | ------ | --------------------------- |
| charges    |             | array  | GetChargesListChargesResult |
| pageNum    | 第几页         | string |                             |
| pageSize   | 每页数量        | string |                             |
| totalCount | 总行数         | string |                             |
| totalPages | 总页数         | string |                             |



**schema Description**



**GetChargesListChargesResult**

| name         | description          | type           | schema |
| ------------ | -------------------- | -------------- | ------ |
| chargeWeight | 计费重量                 | number(double) |        |
| count        | 计量数量                 | number(double) |        |
| createTime   | 创建时间                 | string         |        |
| currency     | 报价币种                 | string         |        |
| etd          | ETD（预计开船日期）          | string         |        |
| id           | 费用ID                 | integer(int64) |        |

| jobNum       | 工作号                  | string         |        |

| payAmount    | 付款金额                 | number(double) |        |
| payCurrency  | 付款币种                 | string         |        |
| payExchange  | 报价币种和付款币种折算汇率 币种相同传1 | number(double) |        |
| poNum        | PO号                  | string         |        |
| price        | 报价单价                 | number(double) |        |
| remarks      | 费用备注                 | string         |        |
| sku          |                      | string         |        |
| total        | 报价金额合计               | number(double) |        |
| unit         | 计量单位                 | string         |        |
| whCode       | 仓库代码                 | string         |        |

```json
}
```

**Request Example**：

```json
{
    "address": "",
    "audited": false,
    "code": "",
    "companyName": "",
    "companyNameEn": "",

        {

        }
    ],

    "creditRemarks": "",
    "iata": "",
    "idCode": "",
    "isAgent": false,
    "isClient": false,
    "isColoader": false,
    "isCustom": false,
    "isFumigation": false,

    "isTrader": false,
    "isTrucker": false,
    "isWarehouse": false,
    "kc": "",
    "paymentTerm": "DP",
    "remarks": "",
    "role": "shipper",
    "salesLogin": "",
    "taxId": ""
}
```

**Request Params**：

| name                | description         | in     | require | data type           | schema              |
| ------------------- | ------------------- | ------ | ------- | ------------------- | ------------------- |
| appKey              | 鉴权appKey            | header | true    | string              |                     |
| appToken            | 鉴权appToken          | header | true    | string              |                     |
| createCooperatorReq | createCooperatorReq | body   | true    | CreateCooperatorReq | CreateCooperatorReq |

**schema Description**



**CreateCooperatorReq**

| name            | description                                                                                                                                                                        | in   | require | data type      | schema                         |
| --------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---- | ------- | -------------- | ------------------------------ |
| address         | 地址                                                                                                                                                                                 | body | false   | string         |                                |
| audited         | 已审核（标记结算对象的审核状态）                                                                                                                                                                   | body | false   | boolean        |                                |
| code            | 速查代码 留空自动生成                                                                                                                                                                        | body | false   | string         |                                |
| companyName     | 公司名称                                                                                                                                                                               | body | true    | string         |                                |
| companyNameEn   | 公司英文名                                                                                                                                                                              | body | false   | string         |                                |
| companyUrl      | 公司网址                                                                                                                                                                               | body | false   | string         |                                |
| contactList     | 联系方式列表                                                                                                                                                                             | body | false   | array          | CreateCooperatorContactListReq |
| creditDateType  | 信用日期类型（有效值：etd(开船日期), eta(到港日期), ddate(派送日期), biz(接单日期), bdate(账单日期), bill(对账日期), wmsIn(入仓日期), inv(开票日期)）                                                                          | body | true    | string         |                                |
| creditDays      | 信用账期                                                                                                                                                                               | body | false   | integer(int32) |                                |
| creditLimit     | 头程业务信用额度（负数代表需要预存款）                                                                                                                                                                | body | false   | number(double) |                                |
| creditLimitOwms | 海外仓信用额度（负数代表需要预存款）                                                                                                                                                                 | body | false   | number(double) |                                |
| creditRemarks   | 信用备注                                                                                                                                                                               | body | false   | string         |                                |
| iata            | IATA号                                                                                                                                                                              | body | false   | string         |                                |
| idCode          | 结算对象唯一识别码                                                                                                                                                                          | body | true    | string         |                                |
| isAgent         | 代理标识                                                                                                                                                                               | body | false   | boolean        |                                |
| isClient        | 客户标识                                                                                                                                                                               | body | false   | boolean        |                                |
| isColoader      | 同行标识                                                                                                                                                                               | body | false   | boolean        |                                |
| isCustom        | 报关行标识                                                                                                                                                                              | body | false   | boolean        |                                |
| isFumigation    | 熏蒸公司标识                                                                                                                                                                             | body | false   | boolean        |                                |
| isInsurance     | 报销公司标识                                                                                                                                                                             | body | false   | boolean        |                                |
| isLocked        | 锁定编辑（锁定结算对象关键信息的编辑）                                                                                                                                                                | body | false   | boolean        |                                |
| isTrader        | 贸易代理标识                                                                                                                                                                             | body | false   | boolean        |                                |
| isTrucker       | 车行标识                                                                                                                                                                               | body | false   | boolean        |                                |
| isWarehouse     | 库公司标识                                                                                                                                                                              | body | false   | boolean        |                                |
| kc              | KC Number                                                                                                                                                                          | body | false   | string         |                                |
| paymentTerm     | 结算方式（有效值：DP(付款交单), beforeETA(到港前付款), credit(信用帐期), monthly(月结), doubleMonthly(双月结), tripleMonthly(三月结), fourMonthly(四月结), fiveMonthly(五月结), sixMonthly(六月结)）, payByDelivery(派送票结)） | body | true    | string         |                                |
| remarks         | 备注                                                                                                                                                                                 | body | false   | string         |                                |
| role            | 客户类型（有效值：directAccount(直接客户), shipper(发货人), cnee(收货人), co_loader(同行), branch(分公司), trader(贸易商)）                                                                                    | body | true    | string         |                                |
| salesLogin      | 业务员系统登录账号                                                                                                                                                                          | body | false   | string         |                                |
| taxId           | 税号                                                                                                                                                                                 | body | false   | string         |                                |

**CreateCooperatorContactListReq**

| name    | description | in   | require | data type | schema |
| ------- | ----------- | ---- | ------- | --------- | ------ |
| attn    | 联系人         | body | true    | string    |        |
| cc      | 邮件抄送        | body | false   | string    |        |
| email   | 邮件          | body | false   | string    |        |
| mob     | 手机          | body | false   | string    |        |
| openId  | Open Id     | body | false   | string    |        |
| remarks | 备注          | body | false   | string    |        |
| role    | 职位          | body | false   | string    |        |
| tel     | 电话          | body | false   | string    |        |

**Request Example**：

```json
{
    "address": "",
    "audited": false,
    "code": "",
    "companyName": "",
    "companyNameEn": "",
    "contactList": [
        {

            "cc": "",
            "email": "",
            "mob": "",
            "openId": "",
            "remarks": "",
            "role": "",
            "tel": ""
        }
    ],
    "idCode": "",
    "invoiceInfos": [
        {
            "addressTel": "",
            "bankInfo": "",
            "bankInfoUsd": "",
            "einvoiceEmail": "",
            "invoiceTitle": "",
            "mailAddress": "",
            "mailAttn": "",
            "mailMob": "",
            "taxNum": ""
        }
    ],
    "isLocked": false,
    "kc": "",
    "opsFactorys": [
        {
            "address": "",
            "attn": "",
            "cc": "",
            "companyName": "",

            "fax": "",
            "mob": "",

        }

}
```

**Request Params**：

| name                | description         | in     | require | data type           | schema              |
| ------------------- | ------------------- | ------ | ------- | ------------------- | ------------------- |
| appKey              | 鉴权appKey            | header | true    | string              |                     |
| appToken            | 鉴权appToken          | header | true    | string              |                     |
| updateCooperatorReq | updateCooperatorReq | body   | true    | UpdateCooperatorReq | UpdateCooperatorReq |

**schema Description**



**UpdateCooperatorReq**

| name          | description         | in   | require | data type | schema                         |
| ------------- | ------------------- | ---- | ------- | --------- | ------------------------------ |
| address       | 地址                  | body | false   | string    |                                |
| audited       | 已审核（标记结算对象的审核状态）    | body | false   | boolean   |                                |
| code          | 速查代码 留空自动生成         | body | false   | string    |                                |
| companyName   | 公司名称                | body | false   | string    |                                |
| companyNameEn | 公司英文名               | body | false   | string    |                                |
| contactList   | 联系方式列表              | body | false   | array     | CreateCooperatorContactListReq |
| idCode        | 结算对象唯一识别码           | body | true    | string    |                                |
| invoiceInfos  | 发票信息                | body | false   | array     | UpdateCooperatorInvoiceInfoReq |
| isLocked      | 锁定编辑（锁定结算对象关键信息的编辑） | body | false   | boolean   |                                |
| kc            | KC Number           | body | false   | string    |                                |
| opsFactorys   |                     | body | false   | array     | UpdateCooperatorOpsFactoryReq  |
| opsShippers   |                     | body | false   | array     | UpdateCooperatorOpsShipperReq  |
| remarks       | 备注                  | body | false   | string    |                                |
| taxId         | 税号                  | body | false   | string    |                                |

**CreateCooperatorContactListReq**

| name    | description | in   | require | data type | schema |
| ------- | ----------- | ---- | ------- | --------- | ------ |
| attn    | 联系人         | body | true    | string    |        |
| cc      | 邮件抄送        | body | false   | string    |        |
| email   | 邮件          | body | false   | string    |        |
| mob     | 手机          | body | false   | string    |        |
| openId  | Open Id     | body | false   | string    |        |
| remarks | 备注          | body | false   | string    |        |
| role    | 职位          | body | false   | string    |        |
| tel     | 电话          | body | false   | string    |        |

**UpdateCooperatorInvoiceInfoReq**

| name          | description | in   | require | data type | schema |
| ------------- | ----------- | ---- | ------- | --------- | ------ |
| addressTel    | 地址电话        | body | false   | string    |        |
| bankInfo      | RMB开户行账号    | body | false   | string    |        |
| bankInfoUsd   | 美金开户行账号     | body | false   | string    |        |
| einvoiceEmail | 电票接收邮箱      | body | false   | string    |        |
| invoiceTitle  | 发票抬头        | body | false   | string    |        |

| taxNum        | 相同税号更新 否则新增 | body | false   | string    |        |
